title: What can I do?
content:
In File Manager, by default there are Owned and Shared folders. Located above the folders and subfolders, there are buttons allowing user to add folders, Upload files and matrices for projects, and Rename, Delete, or Download files or folders. Notice the Create Input for Text Capture button, this option will allow the user to transform text into XML compatible format for the analysis in ETC.

1. Select or Create a Subfolder to activate usable buttons.
2. Do not upload files directly to Owned folder. Instead, open Owned folder and create Subfolder in Owned folder to hold your files for each project.
3. Within a subfolder, you can either Upload files by first selecting the type of file to be uploaded, or you can create new files for Text Capture by clicking on Create Input for Text Capture button.
4. Each project should have a folder, do not mix files and sub-folders in one folder.
